name: Delivery Dash Challenge
description:
Try your hand at delivering express packages on your iPhone or iPad.

Choose which order to deliver the packages based on location and availability schedules.

Then choose which turns to make to drive down the correct streets, going the correct direction, to reach each location within their posted delivery times.

Seven progressively more difficult levels should challenge all ages.

Optionally shares your accomplishments via social media, email, or instant messaging.

Universal App - supports iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad, including standard, Retina, iPhone X and XS displays.
